titleStmt.title: Iudah must into captivitie Six sermons on Ierem. 7.16. Lately preached in the Cathedrall Church of Christ in Canterburie, and elsevvhere, By Thomas Iackson Doctor in Divinitie, and one of the prebends of the said church.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Haviland for Godfrey Emondson and Nicholas Vavasour, and are to be sold at their shop at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through and some pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: their shop at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard
